Business intent: support analysis of optical system performance, evaluate point spread function and effective area for telescopes, used in astrophysics instrumentation.

Keywords: photon positions, PSF, effective area, centroid, histogram, simulation file, analysis, plotting, scanning, radius, cumulative data, image data, telescope, optics.

Now craft summary: The class represents a PSF image built from a list of photon impact coordinates. It can load data from a simulation file, validate positions, compute centroids, generate PSF metrics, calculate effective collection area given scatter area, provide cumulative and image data, and produce visualizations as 2‑D histograms. It also supports scanning radii to determine encircled energy.

Business intent: Provide a reusable component for optical performance evaluation of telescopic systems, enabling scientists/engineers to quantify and visualize point spread functions and effective areas from simulated photon data.
